Reviews.Title: “good location & good price”
Reviews.Author: nc-turkiye
Reviews.Content: stay previous comfortable near vatican city center easily 30 minutes walk bus combination safe location clean price bathroom ok expecting luxury hotel stuffs helpful smiley breakfast hotel near cafe including croissant hot drink am visit rome stay ps 1 stayed october april 2 live jazz suggest alexanderplatz jazz club near hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money!”
Reviews.Author: beebards
Reviews.Content: found hotel basic clean friendly location own bathroom free breakfast little cafe round corner croissant hot drink added breakfast value money thanks hotel stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Possibly the best value for money hotel I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Amanda r
Reviews.Content: fabulous little hotel couple minutes walk vatican st peters square spacious clean shower hot staff friendly helpful dolce vita cafe supplied daily breakfast served croissants tasted miss hotel rickety lift fortunately definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Everything else is average.”
Reviews.Author: Muscovite505
Reviews.Content: funny actually booked hotel called florida received confirmation hotel called address hotel changed name 2 hotels florida 2nd floor 6th dark scary arrived late evening broad daylight ok staff friendly helpful clean division smoking nonsmoking definitely smoking smell obvious kept window times didnt bother bathroom shower cabin sucks taking shower enter bathroom barefoot apart value money id stay hotel time

Reviews.Title: “friendly familyathmosphere - good value for money”
Reviews.Author: norling11
Reviews.Content: family run nice stay rome comfortable bed actually attractive price walk attractions city bus outside door it´s short walk fiumicino airport nice people provide perfect service 3 times highly recommend hotel am denmark communicating english hotel situated busy piazza del poppolo vatican beautful funny elevator building hotel 6th floor don´t close doors properly elevator doesn´t breathless climb i´m looking forward advice don´t drink coffee piazza street vatican it´s 4 times expensive cafés

Reviews.Title: “Very close to Vatican but just average!”
Reviews.Author: travelqueen83
Reviews.Content: hotel close vatican walk 5 mins handy romes sites dotted hard locate underground sites arent actually near stops underground 10 min walk hotel breakfast ok donut croissant tea eat cafe day electric juice child hotel top floor building elevator scary lobby dark cold staff speak little english dated freezing coldi front hotel noisy intially picked view stpeters basilica lean peace hotel average probably suggest staying western normally stay

Reviews.Title: “A Roman Motel 6”
Reviews.Author: Travisman
Reviews.Content: hotel nice price sort mom pop operation hotel located floor building apartments hotel located floors clean bed comfortable staff help location vatican short walk metro line close limitations weird bathroom school elevator wouldnt recommend special occassions honeymoon traveler budget

Reviews.Title: “A Joli time was had”
Reviews.Author: mikegreen
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2010 hotel situated popular pretty street ten minutes walk vatican st peters square major rome dos tourist manual appreciated frenetic feel town aforementioned draw visitors arrived little checkin wander returned appointed time hotel located sixth floor grand looking block apartments greeted friendly receptionist key 45 tokens breakfast nice local cafe corner minute walk map city hotel marked found perfectly acceptable star rating clean functional bed comfy singles joined type nightime slip gap beds shower toiletbidet essence wet luxurious dont luxury prices rome fine tv ceiling fan lest forget essence choice willing accept limitations budget hotel instead focus location charm located apologies awful picture view stayed busy snapping hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: Serban27
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights splendid view basilica san pietro pretty cleaned day staff friendly helpfull breakfast served cafe 3 minutes hotel hotel stilish starting visiting major turistic atractions rome piazza san pietro vatican museums 10 minutes castel piazza navona panteon 20 minutes walk rest sites metro station ottaviano rest piazza del popolo fontana di trevi piazza di colosseum etc pass days costs 11 eur transport fast hotel bathroom ventilation except fan 5 minute shower warm water steams guaranteed apart advised breakfast formed coffe tea croissant breakfast italian people advised family run hotel plan staying 1 am key entrance

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and great value for money. Perfect for the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: Macca2010Leeds
Reviews.Content: wife honeymoon stayed 3 nights hotel chose hotel location value money disappointed stones throw vatican st peters square hotel self 6th floor apartment building bit hard spot arrived greeted friendly staff told gate downstairs reviewer spoke earlier explained gate locked 1am key family hotel sleep people earlier reviews complained breakfast explained ticket cafe corner exchange continental breakfast croissant coffee 2 3 minute walk 2 streets 10 minutes reviewer gone opposite lovely little cafe proper italian feel found hotel extremely lovely price range adequate comfy basics bed wardrobe tv bathroom else sightsee sit hotel al day luxury else pay lot beautiful close vatican surrounding friendly staff comfy bed sleep bargain price hotel mention travel rome roma pass bargain tourists

Reviews.Title: “Run the other way!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: special_dayz
Reviews.Content: booked budget holiday partner wedding didnt expect moment arrived disappointment staff pleasant helpful dank dark tiny bathrooms tea milk partner request told finished dayat 5 evening breakfast served pub hotelnot ten minute walk
